TopicTitle: Text input fields for part positioning?

Articles.Content: Given how important proper balancing of different parts is to ensure efficient flight (and how easy it is to sperg out over even the most slight of deviations in height and whatnot) having the ability to manually tweak the positional values of parts as you're working on them would be tremendously helpful. Being able to copy the height data for my main fuel tank and paste that into the height fields for secondary tanks and the struts/decouplers that hold them in place particularly would be awesome. Maybe have something like a little window in the bottom-left corner under the parts list with text fields containing X, Y and Z coordinates when you click on a part?
Add to this a numerical readout of the center of mass and center of lift
